price: “Eegaa! Anis isin waliin warra eegu irrayii” jedhiin.
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
